title: Why is nobody talking about this ?
selftext:
[https://www.thehindu.com/news/national/other-states/telangana-cm-cabinet-colleagues-arrive-in-pandharpur-in-motorcade-of-600-vehicles/article67013227.ece](https://www.thehindu.com/news/national/other-states/telangana-cm-cabinet-colleagues-arrive-in-pandharpur-in-motorcade-of-600-vehicles/article67013227.ece)

Fucking 600 motorcars, such a good waste of taxpayers money - KCR probably.

Seriously guys, how is this getting so less coverage? Anybody else wondered:

a) Why maharashtra of all states, we are not even Telangana's neighbour

b) Also why 600 cars,nobody gonna talka bout climate or even the money wasted

What was this, an ego contest, what did it even prove/accomplish?

Looking forward to my fellow brothers/sisters thoughts..
comments: BJP paid them to grab non-BJP votes from ShivSena-NCP-INC. Simple as that.

\>  Why maharashtra of all states, we are not even Telangana's neighbour

https://preview.redd.it/cjbxcv2j4x8b1.png?width=412&format=png&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=10f6571796071b47466aec93454d24cb97b4bc32
He is not getting single seat here. Don't worry. We have enough oppositions here
Solapur was bordering the Hyderabad state. Mid Maharashtra was in Hyderabad state
Thereâ€™s a lot of self importance crap out with indian politicians
